tns:patch.author: Octavian Ciubotaru
tns:patch.description: recreate view, this will always be the last version of the view

script.lang: SELECT settingsvalue FROM amp_global_settings where settingsname='Recreate the views on the next server restart';

DROP VIEW IF EXISTS v_indirect_primaryprogram_level_4;
CREATE OR REPLACE VIEW v_indirect_primaryprogram_level_4 AS SELECT aav.amp_activity_id, COALESCE(v.name, '#') AS name, COALESCE(v.amp_program_id, -999999999) AS amp_program_id, v.percentage, COALESCE(v.cnt_nulls, 0) AS cnt_nulls FROM amp_activity_version aav LEFT JOIN ( SELECT a.amp_activity_id, level.name, apl.id4 AS amp_program_id, SUM(ip.program_percentage) AS percentage, COUNT(*) - COUNT(ip.program_percentage) AS cnt_nulls FROM amp_activity_program a JOIN amp_activity_indirect_program ip ON a.amp_activity_program_id = ip.amp_activity_program_id JOIN ni_all_programs_with_levels apl ON ip.amp_program_id = apl.amp_theme_id LEFT JOIN amp_theme level ON level.amp_theme_id = apl.id4 JOIN amp_program_settings aps ON aps.amp_program_settings_id = a.program_setting WHERE aps.name = 'Primary Program' GROUP BY a.amp_activity_id, level.name, apl.id4 ) v ON aav.amp_activity_id = v.amp_activity_id;
